Event.name: Jury_deliberation
Event.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Jury</fen> discuss the <fen>Case</fen> and its <fen>Charges</fen> in order to evaluate the <fen>Possible_sentence</fen> of the accused.
<ex><fex name="Jury">The jury</fex> <t>deliberated</t> <fex name="Possible_sentence">his guilt</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>The amount of time for which the deliberation is ongoing.</def-root>

Arg.name: Charges
Arg.definition: <def-root>The legal label for the crime that the defendant is accused of.</def-root>

Arg.name: Case
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Case</fen> which a trial is convened to decide. </def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>When the deliberation takes place. <ex>The jury <t>deliberated</t> for three hours <fex name="Time">last Tuesday.</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>Where the deliberation takes place. <ex>The jury <t>deliberated</t> for several hours <fex name="Place">in the Oakland courthouse</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Possible_sentence
Arg.definition: <def-root>A sentence that the jury considers during deliberation. <ex>The jury <t>deliberated</t> <fex name="PS">his guilt</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: deliberation.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the activity of the jury after the presentation of all the evidence and statement in a trial, as they try to decide about the guilt or innocence of the defendant

lexUnit.name: deliberate.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: a jury engaging in careful consideration to reach a verdict
